article: former arsenal goalkeeper bob wilson told a match-fixing trial tuesday that bruce grobbelaar would make `` spectacularly wrong '' decisions but he did n't think he was guilty of deliberately letting in goals .
abstract: former arsenal keeper praises grobbelaar 's saves
